entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:34 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:20 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
